I'd love to connect with anyone who's thoughtful and collaborative. Can't wait for the preference ranking and private convos—let's make this a great start! Looking forward to getting to know you all.

I aim to build genuine connections while being mindful of the game's competitive nature. I appreciate P4's emphasis on trust and collaboration - those values resonate with me too. I'm particularly interested in forming meaningful alliances with those who can think long-term. Looking forward to our private conversations!
